p.p: A code that describes the reason for a telehealth alert.

p.strong:
This is a preliminary set of values, for the full list consult the latest published version of the SNOMED CT subset with Original ID 48991000000137.
NB: This subset ID, 48991000000137, has not yet been defined in a release of SNOMED CT. The values which are permissible are the children of the concept finding 404684003.
